alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 10:01PM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno affecting Rusk, Nacogdoches, Shelby and San Augustine Counties. For the Attoyac Bayou...including Chireno...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Attoyac Bayou near Chireno. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Expect flooded paths and secondary roadways. Move livestock and equipment to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Monday the stage was estimated near 17.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue a slow fall through the remainder of this week, but will remain above the 14 foot flood stage through the weekend. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening at 1015 PM CST.
